features: UNPARALLELED SOFTNESS: PoeticEHome bamboo face towel is 100% viscose derived from bamboo pulp, 2X softer than cotton and other plant-based alternatives, meticulously crafted for sensitive skin, providing a gentle and soothing touch. Experience a truly pampering cleansing experience without any irritation or redness.

DURABLE & ABSORBENCY: Our facial cleansing towels boast outstanding sturdy and water absorption capabilities, ensuring a thorough and efficient drying and washing experience. They absorb moisture effortlessly so you can turn it into a homemade, multi-purpose, reusable clean wet wipe. Say goodbye to dampness and hello to a clean face.

PERFECT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Bamboo viscose contain the natural clean ingredient "bamboo quinone", making them ideal for Baby Diaper Changes, Runny Noses, Drool, Meal Time, Elderly Personal Care, and Nursing. They provide a safe, gentle, and irritation-free cleansing experience, leaving your skin clean, healthy, and worry-free.

VERSATILE & EFFICIENT: Say goodbye to conventional towels, makeup remover pads, and tissue papers. With exceptional durability and absorbency, bamboo fiber disposable towels effortlessly adapt to a multitude of tasks. From gentle facial cleansing to effective makeup removal, and even tackling spills and messes, one towel is all you need for unparalleled convenience and efficiency.

SUSTAINABLE & LONG-LASTING: We care about the environment as much as you do. Bamboo grows very fast, it is a renewable sustainable resource, making it a responsible choice for conscious consumers. By choosing our bamboo wipes, you're positively impacting the planet. Each pouch is designed to be portable for outdoor use. 100 sheets per pack, ensuring you have an ample supply for all your skincare needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a Eglu Omlet coop that I clean up the racks daily. Plus, I wipe down the plastic inside. These are much more economical than what I was using. I spray Force of Nature cleaner/disinfectant on the wipe and voila!Just opened my second pack because the first one disappeared. Still had about 1/4th left in it.And, I think you can burn these. Haven’t tried, yet.They’re thin but they DO NOT TEAR APART!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After reading reviews. I decided to purchase these as a replacement for my old microfiber makeup remover cloths. I am glad I did, these are soft and rinse out well. I may not reuse for makeup but I use again for clean ups or for other hand messes. They are smaller I think than the other well known brand. I love that these are bamboo fibers. I recommend if you are wanting something soft for face etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good wipes - but buy them for your reasons
reviews.reviewText: I really like the idea of sustainability for this product and was eager to try it out. Upon first of the wipes I noticed that it was almost akin to paper towels and it’s not to say it’s a bad thing. For the messed like poop from the baby, I’d have to say that it did the job and there were a few times, maybe due to user error, that they almost ripped whereas most of the wipes I buy from other brands or big box stores, they hardly ripped. As far as wetness they were the perfect wetness and not too dry or wet. Overall it’s a good product if I was mainly buying all sustainability products but I’d recommend others based on cost

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am not sensitive to chemical smell but I wanted to eliminate any chemicals and bleach from my Kleenex because I have a Basel cell carcinoma right at the opening of my nose. I’m a retired RN and I know the puffs I have used for 30 years probably caused this. I should have tried to find a video how these tissues are made from the bamboo. My husband worked at a paper mill when he was young and they have to use a ton of chemicals to make paper. What I don’t understand there is not one single company in the USA making unbleached tissue paper and toilet paper. I can not find any at sprouts, Natural Grocer…if I had the money to make an alternative product …I would be a millionaire

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better then all known regular tissue that used before
reviews.reviewText: They are really soft and the same time durable to use it. They do not cause irritation . Pleasant to use .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, sturdy, and perfect for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These 100% bamboo dry wipes are fantastic! After dampening them with warm water, they're perfect for wiping my baby's bottom. They're incredibly soft yet sturdy. Designed specifically for sensitive skin, I feel confident and reassured using them on my baby. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got these wipes for my baby and I would say these are great quality wipes. The material is great which is environment friendly. The absorption capability and softness are the prime features which makes skin non-irritable. These are free from harsh chemicals and great for daily use. They effectively clean and absorb moisture, leaving the skin feeling fresh and dry.The packaging is thoughtfully designed for busy parents on the go. The flip-top lid ensures that the wipes stay moist and are easily accessible. These wipes are not just limited to diaper changes. We've found them to be incredibly useful for wiping little hands and faces, cleaning toys, and even quick spills.Overall for the price and quality of the wipes, these are recommended to try and worthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smell slightly like sulphur
reviews.reviewText: I really like these wipes. I find there a really great substitute for baby wipes, but you have to wet them yourself. Because of that they’re great to put into my diaper bag and just keep there as a back up, because if I put wet wipes in the diaper bag they’ll sit and grow with bacteria because of the moisture, but that doesn’t happen with these because they’re not wet!I will say that I do not like using them on my face. They are soft and thats fine, but they smell like sulfur. I don’t know why, but it’s not pleasant and it gets stuck in my nose and I don’t like it. They also have a very strange texture when wet. It’s not a bad texture, but it is something that I’ve had to get used to.I love to wipe up spills and clean messes with these and clean counters. They are super durable like paper towels, except more so. So I can really scrub and they stay intact.
Won't break when wet. Gentle for face
Sehr gut für das Gesicht und sehr weich ... keine Irritationen, was gut ist

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very absorbent, works well on my wound.
We use it for our baby. Super soft and resistant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Admittedly, there are things I loved about this bamboo dry wipes. One is that it is a multipurpose wipes. I use it for house cleaning like dusting surfaces or wiping spills on table. To reuse it, I hand wash them, let it dry & use again for 3-4 times. Also, I use it for skin cleaning such as wiping my LO face & body. Another great thing about it is that it is suitable for sensitive skin. It doesn’t irritate my face like other wipes & tissues do. I have been using this almost everyday.Despite these wipes are reusable for a couple of times, they can’t still be cost effective. These wipes are ultimately disposable, which means that I will need to purchase more once they are used up, unlike washable reusable wipes. Additionally, I am hesitant to reuse them for cleaning the skin due to potential contamination and hygiene concerns.Overall, I would recommend these bamboo wipes due to absorbency, softness & versatility. However, if you are seeking a product that can be reused multiple times, these wipes may not be the most suitable choice. Thank you for taking time to read my unbiased review. I hope you’ll hit 👍 if you find it helpful.
